description: Team roast beetroot and carrot with ricotta, hazelnuts and herbs for a vibrant side dish that's right at home at any dinner party or a Sunday roast.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Beetroot
name: Healthier Roast Beetroot & Ricotta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 medium beetroot, peeled, cut into thick wedges
1 bunch Dutch carrots, trimmed, scrubbed, halved lengthways
1 punnet dill, sprigs picked, half roughly chopped
0.25 cup blanched hazelnuts, toasted, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Whisk oil and vinegar in a small jug.
Place beetroot on tray and drizzle with half of the dressing. Bake for 50 minutes, adding carrots to the tray halfway through cooking, or until vegetables are tender.
Meanwhile, combine ricotta and half of the chopped dill in a small bowl. Season with pepper.
Divide ricotta mixture among serving plates. Top with vegetables, hazelnuts and remaining dill sprigs. Serve drizzled with remaining dressing.
